Description:
Good functional knowledge of US & Canada Payroll
Production Support for US & Canada currently implemented on Lawson and is expected to move to Employee Central Payroll in medium term 
Role will include scaling current support team strategically as more countries get implemented on Employee Central Payroll across different time zones
Good understanding of Employee Central Payroll to support UK, Ireland, US and Canada Payroll
Hands on experience in configuration of Employee Central payroll for UK, Ireland, US and Canada to fix bugs, change request and enhancements
Assist with performing monthly system testing as new patches/fixes are applied (i.e., Employee Central Payroll).
Good understanding of standard SAP Integrations with Employee Central Payroll 
Experience of maintaining large scale enterprise applications ensuring stability, uptime, seamless operational efficiency of end-to-end payroll process for Employee Central Payroll to support UK, Ireland, US and Canada
Experience of setting up robust support model by leveraging mix of colleague and external partner teams
Experience of working with multiple stakeholders, influencing change, driving end to end user journey based solution design
Experience of creating/influencing roadmap, has good understanding of HR & Payroll processes 
Experience in Agile Product Delivery 
Problem-solving and communications skills (written and verbal) that reflect structured, clear, and objective thinking
Enough technical depth to comfortably engage in problem solving with technical membersJob Details
